item.title: How can I simulate interactive console in VSCode debugger
item.description: the VS Code debugger console doesn’t currently support piping any input through to stdin. FYI, you can tell the Code debugger to use an external console in the launch config: "externalConsole": true It has a possible workaround, using remote debug + vscode task, but that is not trivial. It has a possible workaround, using remote debug + vscode task, but that is not trivial. launch.json { // Use IntelliSense to learn about possible attributes.
